segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, while everything else is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children sneaking cookies, and it's clear they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is just asking for trouble, and the woman is completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she's so focused on that plate when there's so much else going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her cookie, and it's like the woman is in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at her to wake up and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something soon before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
